pr_title: DBZ-2623 Build checkstyle rules in GH Action

timeline.bodyText:
So thinking about it, I think this is what should be run here:
mvn clean package -DskipTests=true -DskipITs=true process-sources -Dformat.formatter.goal=validate -Dformat.imports.goal=check
timeline.author: gunnarmorling
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -21,7 +21,7 @@ jobs:
           ${{ runner.os }}-maven-
 
     - name: Build configuration
-      run: mvn clean install -pl :debezium-ide-configs
+      run: mvn clean install -pl :debezium-ide-configs,:debezium-checkstyle

replies.bodyText: This also means Checkstyle, Impsort and Format check can be skipped in the main test run which save some time there.
replies.author: gunnarmorling

timeline.bodyText: So can we actually skip format and impsort check? At least -Dcheckstyle.skip=true should be doable.
